JSR-252 Issue #111: Specified that a component must allow child components to be added to and removed from the child list of the currrent component, even though the child component returns null from getParent()
JSR-252 Issue #99: Specified Java EE 5 Generics usage where applicable.
JSR-252 Issue #13: Specified "by type" converter registration for BigDecimal and BigInteger
JSR-252 Issue #160: Added and specified ResponseWriter.writeText method that takes a UIComponent argument.
JSR-252 Issue #155: Specified "columnClasses", "rowClasses" descriptions for panelGrid in renderkit docs.
JSR-252 Issue #154: Fixed FacesTag "name" attribute discrepency - made it a String (was ValueExpression).
JSR-252 Issue #151: Specified standard converter for Enums
JSR-252 Issue #135: Support Java EE 5 enums as valid types
JSR-252 Issue #123: Clarified renderkit docs with respect to dataTable attribute rendering
JSR-252 Issue #120: Specified in the renderkit docs that commandButton rendering can generate javascript for "onclick" attribute.
JSR-252 Issue #98: Specified that "SelectManyCheckboxListRenderer" and "RadioRenderer" must render the "label" element after the "input" element for each "SelectItem".
JSR-252 Issue #75: Added "getRequestContentType" and "getResponseContentType" to ExternalContext.
JSR-252 Issue #82: Added new feature, the ability to resolve ResourceBundles via the EL without the use of the <f:loadBundle> tag.
JSR-252 Issue #81: Enable the message displayed for "required" validation, conversion, and validation to be overridden by the page author (JSP or non-JSP).
JSR-252 Issue #78: Added a more "user-friendly" default error message for UIInput "update model".
JSR-252 Issue #73: Added a new FacesException - "javax.faces.application.ViewExpiredException"
JSR-252 Issue #67: Allow the resetting of an input component's value by introducing a resetValue() method on UIInput
JSR-252 Issue #59: Avoid EL expression evaluation for "value" attribute on "AttributeTag".  "AttributeTag" now passes the expression to UIComponent for evaluation.
JSR-252 Issue #51: Allow implementations to check for the presence of a servlet-class definition in a web app deployment descriptor as a means to abort the configuration and save startup time.
JSR-252 Issue #50: Allow an application to specify multiple render kits by introducing an optional "renderKitId" attribute on "<f:view>".
JSR-252 Issue # 47: Introduced a mechanism to detect if a request is a postback.
JSR-252 Issue #45: Avoided concurrent read issues by using a java.util.HashMap instead of java.util.WeakHashMap for a component's Property Descriptor Map
JSR-252 Issue #43: Migrated over to using XML Schema (from DTD) for configuration file validation.
JSR-252 Issue #30: Make the "commandButton" "image" attribute render the same as the "graphicImage" "img" attribute for consistency.
JSR-252 Issue #27: specified rendering of style, class, lang and dir for the h:messages
JSR-252 Issue #21: Provide additional "binding" attribute for the core Converter, Listener, and Validator tags that would be used as a ValueExpression to alternatively create the instance
JSR-252 Issue #20: Specify that the event queue should be cleared after each phase (except for RestoreViewPhase and RenderResponse) if responseComplete or renderResponse has been set
JSR-252 Issue #18: <f:loadBundle> behavior clarifications
JSR-252 Issue #17: Introduced a new optional "layout" attribute on the "PanelGroup" component that controls the rendering of either a "div" or "span" HTML element.
JSR-252 Issue #15: Enhanced the usage of the "Decorator Pattern" for ViewHandler, StateManager and ResponseWriter
JSR-252 Issue #8: Made UIViewRoot a source of PhaseEvent(s) for all phases of the request processing lifecycle except RestoreView.
JSR-252 Issue #6: Introduced a new optional "label" attribute for input components that will provide an association between a component, and the message that the component (indirectly) produced.
JSR-252 Issue #5: Clarified the use of a string literal for the "action" attribute on ActionSource components.
JSR-252 Issue #4: Added headerClass and footerClass attributes at the "h:column" level.
JSR-252 Issue #85: Add new tag: f:setPropertyActionListener.  Useful for pushing values into managed beans without allowing modification of the value.
JSR-252 Issue #93: Added "escape" flag indicating the text of UISelectItem should be escaped when rendering.
JSR-252 Issue #145: Define new method on UIComponent, invokeOnComponent().
MyfacesConfig.getCurrentInstance not thread safe
JSR-252 Issue #303: Clarified the use of encodeChildren with no renderer: render not no-op
JSR-252 Issue #134: Backward compatability issues

JSR-252 Issue # 48: Specify the algorithm used for client id generation as well as provide a way to allow the page author to specify exactly what the client id should be, and preventing Faces from altering it.
